title: Upgrade Season Ticket Holder Seats
description: A long-time season ticket holder wants to upgrade their seats to a better location for the next season.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's account and their current seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's account and current seats.

tasks.description: Check the seat upgrade availability list for the upcoming season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several better seat locations that are available.

tasks.description: Present the available upgrade options and the difference in price to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the new seat locations and the additional cost.

tasks.description: Process the seat upgrade and generate the new invoice for the season tickets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the customer's seats and invoice.
